feed.title: Track Awesome Playcanvas Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome PlayCanvas assets, resources, and more.

entry.title: Awesome Playcanvas Updates on Jun 30, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Playcanvas Updates on Jun 04, 2025

  • PlayCanvas Editor - Browser-based editor for creating 3D web applications.

  • Sutro Tower - Explore this 3D Gaussian Splat of San Francisco's communications tower.

entry.title: Awesome Playcanvas Updates on Feb 23, 2025
entry.content:
PlayCanvas Products

  • PlayCanvas Engine (⭐10k) - Open source JavaScript graphics application framework.
  • PlayCanvas React (⭐250) - Open source React wrapper for the PlayCanvas Engine.
  • PlayCanvas Web Components (⭐42) - Open source Web Components wrapper for the PlayCanvas Engine.
  • SuperSplat - Open source platform for editing and publishing 3D Gaussian Splats.
  • Model Viewer - Open source model viewer for viewing glTF and PLY (3D Gaussian Splats) files.
  • Texture Tool (⭐7) - Open source tool for reprojecting textures.
  • PCUI (⭐705) - Open source front-end framework used by the PlayCanvas toolset.

Community

  • Forum
  • LinkedIn
  • X
  • YouTube

entry.title: Awesome Playcanvas Updates on Oct 28, 2019
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Create a Bowling Game - Create a physics-based bowling game.
  • Create a Space Shooter - Recreate Asteroids in this Tutsplus tutorial.
  • MDN tutorial - Build up a basic demo with PlayCanvas.
  • Official Tutorials - Large collection of official PlayCanvas tutorials.

Extensions and Utilities

  • playcanvas-ar (⭐243) - Marker-based AR solution built on ARTollkit.
  • playcanvas-p2.js (⭐23) - An integration with the p2.js 2D physics engine.
  • playcanvas-spine (⭐50) - Spine plugin for PlayCanvas for 2D animations.
  • playcanvas-tween (⭐64) - Officially supported tween animation plugin.
  • Sublime Completions (⭐4) - Sublime Text Autocompletion for the PlayCanvas API.

Technical Demos

  • After the Flood - Collaboration with Mozilla to promote WebGL 2.
  • Casino - Physically rendered 3D casino environment.
  • Global Illumination - GI approximation using interpolated lightmaps.
  • Seemore - Collaboration with ARM to promote mobile WebGL.
  • Sponza - Run-time lightmapped Sponza environment.
  • Star-Lord - First ever PBR demo from PlayCanvas.
  • Steampunk Slots - Physically rendered slots machine.

Games / Browser Games

  • Beyond Bionic: Extreme Encounters - Outdoor adventures in this game from the BBC.
  • Disney's Hour of Code - Moana - Learn programming fundamentals with Disney's Moana.
  • Flappy Bird - Guide the bird through as many pipes as possible.
  • Galaxies: Combat - Carefully select power ups to defeat waves of hostile ships.
  • Lego Jurassic World: Off-road Race - Dinosaurs, LEGO and vehicle stunts.
  • Orbital Survival - Destroy wave after wave of enemies on a tiny world.
  • SWOOOP - Pick up gems in a bi-plane above a magical island.

Automotive / YouTube Playables

  • BMW i8 - Car visualizer.
  • DAB Motors - Motorcycle configurator.
  • Indian Motorcycles - Motorcycle configurator.
  • Polaris RZR - Off-road vehicle configurator.

Product Configurators / YouTube Playables

  • Elfa Closets - Closet configurator.
  • iPhone 6 - iPhone visualizer.
  • Renewal by Andersen Windows - Window configurator.
  • Willab Gardens Greenhouses - Greenhouse configurator.

entry.title: Awesome Playcanvas Updates on Oct 21, 2019
entry.content:
Extensions and Utilities

  • playcanvas-node (⭐5) - REST API wrapper for Node.js.
  • tween.js (⭐10k) - Popular JavaScript tweening library that integrates easily with PlayCanvas.

Interactive Experiences

  • Ride Along 2 - Using WebGL to promote a Hollywood movie release.
  • Rugby World Cup - Promoting the Rugby World Cup in London's Piccadilly Circus.
